Docs.summary: Pointers to the base address storing the pixels. Must call to to lock the base address
Docs.value: Pointer to the base address storing the pixels, or if the pixel buffer is not locked.

Docs.summary: The number of bytes per row in the pixel buffer.

Docs.summary: Type identifier for the MonoTouch.CoreVideo.CVPixelBuffer type.

remarks.para: The returned token is the CoreFoundation type identifier (CFType) that has been assigned to this class.
This can be used to determine type identity between different CoreFoundation objects.
You can retrieve the type of a CoreFoundation object by invoking the on the native handle of the object

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype CoreVideo.CVReturn Lock(valuetype CoreVideo.CVOptionFlags lockFlags) cil managed

Docs.summary: Locks the storage for the pixel buffer.
Docs.remarks: You must call this method to access the pixel buffer from the CPU. Calls to this method must be balanced with calls to . If the lockFlags contains CVPixelBufferLock.ReadOnly, you must also pass this value to Unlock.
